C2 any of various devices or drugs intended to prevent pregnancy: The clinic provides a free supply of contraceptives upon request.

relating to any of various devices or drugs intended to prevent pregnancy: contraceptive pill There are several kinds of contraceptive pills available, and they act in slightly different ways.contraceptive method No one contraceptive method will meet every woman's needs.
More examplesFewer examplesThe data on their contraceptive use and health was collected from their GPs.She has a contraceptive injection every three months. Zookeepers did not believe she was pregnant when they inserted the contraceptive device.
